description:
The game also includes:
• Online Leaderboard for competitive play.
• Addictive gameplay that keeps players hooked.
• Enjoy the experience with excellent, relaxing music.

In Animals Drop, your task is to strategically pair up adorable animals of the same kind to prevent them from jumping out of the box. With each successful match, you'll create new animal. Let's create big elephants!
name: Animals drop
